channel.title: GitHub Vue Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Vue in GitHub

item.title: Lissy93/dashy
item.description: 🚀 A self-hostable personal dashboard built for you. Includes status-checking, widgets, themes, icon packs, a UI editor and tons more!

item.title: frappe/helpdesk
item.description: Modern, Streamlined, Free and Open Source Customer Service Software

item.title: iAJue/MoeKoeMusic
item.description: 一款开源简洁高颜值的酷狗第三方客户端 An open-source, concise, and aesthetically pleasing third-party client for KuGou that supports Windows / macOS / Linux / Web

item.title: Sjj1024/PakePlus
item.description: Turn any webpage/Vue/React and so on into desktop and mobile app under 5M with easy in few minutes. 轻松将任意网站/Vue/React等项目构建为轻量级(小于5M)多端桌面应用和手机应用仅需几分钟. https://ppofficial.netlify.app

item.title: frappe/crm
item.description: Fully featured, open source CRM

item.title: crmeb/CRMEB
item.description: 🔥CRMEB开源商城免费开源多语言商城系统，Tp6框架商城，系统可商用；包含小程序商城、H5商城、公众号商城、PC商城、App，支持分销、拼团、砍价、秒杀、优惠券、积分、会员等级、小程序直播、页面DIY，前后端分离，方便二开，更有详细使用文档、接口文档、数据字典、二开文档/视频教程，欢迎大家提出宝贵意见和建议

item.title: CorentinTh/it-tools
item.description: Collection of handy online tools for developers, with great UX.

item.title: frappe/frappe-ui
item.description: A set of components and utilities for rapid UI development

item.title: RikkaApps/websites
item.description: Websites for Rikka apps.

item.title: qier222/YesPlayMusic
item.description: 高颜值的第三方网易云播放器，支持 Windows / macOS / Linux

item.title: imsyy/SPlayer
item.description: 🎉 一个简约的音乐播放器，支持逐字歌词，下载歌曲，展示评论区，音乐云盘及歌单管理，音乐频谱，移动端基础适配 | 网易云音乐 | A minimalist music player

item.title: bastienwirtz/homer
item.description: A very simple static homepage for your server.

item.title: ccbikai/Sink
item.description: ⚡ A Simple / Speedy / Secure Link Shortener with Analytics, 100% run on Cloudflare.

item.title: moeru-ai/airi
item.description: 💖🧸 Self hosted, you owned Grok Companion, a container of souls of waifu, cyber livings to bring them into our worlds, wishing to achieve Neuro-sama's altitude. Capable of realtime voice chat, Minecraft, Factorio playing. Web / macOS / Windows supported.

item.title: crmeb/crmeb_java
item.description: Java商城 免费 开源 CRMEB商城JAVA版，SpringBoot + Maven + Swagger + Mybatis Plus + Redis + Uniapp +Vue+elementUI 包含移动端、小程序、PC后台、Api接口；有产品、用户、购物车、订单、积分、优惠券、营销、余额、权限、角色、系统设置、组合数据、可拖拉拽的form表单等模块，大量的减少了二开的成本。

item.title: Gzh0821/pvzg_site
item.description: PvZ2 Gardendless Official Website | A rewritten Plants vs Zombies 2 PC port

item.title: requarks/wiki
item.description: Wiki.js | A modern and powerful wiki app built on Node.js

item.title: jekip/naive-ui-admin
item.description: Naive Ui Admin 是一款基于 Vue3、Vite3 和 TypeScript 的先进中后台解决方案，集成了前沿的前端技术栈和典型业务模型。它拥有二次封装组件、动态菜单、权限校验、粒子化权限控制等核心功能，旨在帮助企业快速构建高质量的中后台项目。无论在新技术运用或业务实践层面，都能为您提供有力支持，并将持续更新，以满足您不断变化的需求

item.title: nuxtlabs/docus
item.description: Write beautiful documentations with Nuxt and Markdown.

item.title: nuxt/ui
item.description: The Intuitive Vue UI Library powered by Reka UI & Tailwind CSS.
